Sections.Name: Modules
Sections.Description: Enable or disable the optional modules contained in this mod depending on personal preferences and playstyle.

Keys.Name: bedSleeping
Keys.Description: Allows sleep to be initiated by clicking on a bed.

Keys.Name: advancedArchery
Keys.Description: Alters to-hit and damage done by arrows depending on the length of draw.

Keys.Name: encumbranceEffects
Keys.Description: Provides speed and fatigue penalties when carrying too much weight.

Keys.Name: bandaging
Keys.Description: Allows bandages to be used for healing based on medical skill.

Keys.Name: shipPorts
Keys.Description: Player can only board their ship when in a port town.

Keys.Name: underworldExpulsion
Keys.Description: Enables underworld guilds to expel members for poor performance.. with prejudice.

Keys.Name: climbingRestriction
Keys.Description: Prevents climbing with a weapon drawn.

Keys.Name: weaponSpeed
Keys.Description: Moderates DPS of weapons for characters with high speed attributes.

Keys.Name: weaponMaterials
Keys.Description: Moderates the to-hit bonuses of weapon materials so skill remains key factor

Keys.Name: equipDamage
Keys.Description: Increases equipment damage proportional to max condition.

Keys.Name: enemyAppearance
Keys.Description: Remixes human enemy appearance based on class

Keys.Name: purificationPotion
Keys.Description: Changes purification potion to cure poison rather than grant invisibility

Keys.Name: autoExtinguishLight
Keys.Description: Automatically extinguish any light sources when you exit a dungeon

Keys.Name: classicStrengthDamageBonus
Keys.Description: Use classic displayed strength damage bonus (half) instead of classic internal value

Keys.Name: variantNpcs
Keys.Description: Enable variant NPC sprites in shops & taverns

Keys.Name: variantResidents
Keys.Description: This populates 80% of houses with the townsfolk you see walking around insteam of random adventurer flats

Keys.Name: loanAmountPerLevel
Keys.Description: Sets the maximum amount per level that can be borrowed from banks

Keys.Name: enhancedRiding
Keys.Description: Enable enhanced horse riding module, improving presentation and allowing galloping.

Keys.Name: RealisticMovement
Keys.Description: Makes the horse and cart movement backwards and sideways more realistic and limited.

Keys.Name: followTerrainEnabled
Keys.Description: Enables terrain following when riding.

Keys.Name: followTerrainSoftenFactor
Keys.Description: Scale factor to soften terrain gradient following. (0=none, 32=max soften)

Keys.Name: GallopingInTowns
Keys.Description: Enables galloping (sprinting) while riding horses in towns.

Keys.Name: TrampleCivilians
Keys.Description: Enables the crime of trampling innocent townsfolk when galloping in a town. Be careful!

Sections.Name: RefinedTraining
Sections.Description: Refines guild training service so skill is selected first.

Keys.Name: refinedTraining
Keys.Description: Enable refined skill training service.

Keys.Name: variableTrainingPrice
Keys.Description: Makes price of training based on skill level as well as player level.

Keys.Name: intensiveTraining
Keys.Description: Enables intensive training option for a session per day for five days, for extra cost.
